title: Unity CEO John Riccitiello Resigns After Nearly Tanking Entire Company
content:
GameBeat:

John Riccitiello, CEO of Unity, has resigned from the company in the wake of a pricing controversy that left developers in open revolt.

It’s hard to overstate how bad Unity’s last month has been. So in some sense the right thing has happened: the CEO rammed through a terrible policy change, game developers revolted, and the CEO has now resigned.

 ★
author: John Gruber
